channel.title: Winners on Analysis Paralysis

item.title: Spiel des Jahres 2022 winners
item.author: contact@recommend.games (Recommend.Games)
item.description: The cat’s out of the bag and the winners have been announced! As mentioned before, this year was the first time the ceremony was held on a Saturday evening and I had the immense pleasure of attending it live. In case you missed my very proffesional live coverage on Twitter, here’s a summary of the event. But without further ado, here are the winners of Spiel des Jahres and Kennerspiel des Jahres 2022!
